Sky Center - The modern glass facade offers fantastic views of the city from every floor.

Buena Vista Castle - It may be a small world, but this dainty castle is just what your expanding city needs.

Stone Manor - Strong and rustic, who can resist this mountain getaway?
Bavarian Cottage - Grab your lederhosen and head for the hills around this beautiful home!

Slate Manor - There's no equal to the durability and natural beauty of a slate roof.
Athletes’ Hotel - Show the away teams some good ol’ fashioned hospitality in this state-of-the-art facility!
Mountainside Lodge - Warm and welcoming, you'll feel perfectly cozy in this snug retreat.
Stone Terrace - This picturesque residence steady and reliable. Solid as a rock, like they say.

Quarry - The only spot where being between a rock and a hard place is a good thing!

Quarry - The only spot where being between a rock and a hard place is a good thing!
Smoothie Bar - Providing even the busiest of your residents with a vitamin-rich, relaxed tropical feeling.
Donut Shop - More than just your local police officers enjoy these tasty treats. Everyone can get their fill here.
Hollywood Diner - Enjoy a taste of the simple life with a touch of Hollywood flair and a side of fries.
Bread Basket - Enchanting aromas making your mouth water every morning? You're not dreaming - it's the Bread Basket just around the corner.
Stadium - Watching the local soccer team's home game is quite the pastime, especially with a nice cold brewski in your hand.
Beer Garden - This traditional beer garden turns any neighborhood into an October Fest...as long as there's enough beer!
Gym - Your scale doesn't lie ... it's time to start pumping iron again. Hit the gym!
Pizza Palace - Delicious dough is tossed into the air, topped with cheese and cooked to perfection. Welcome to the Pizza Palace!
Vegetable Stand - It's no secret that getting all your vitamins make you feel happy. This little stand is there to provide all of your citizens with the veggies they need to feel good.
Art Gallery - If your citizens are craving art, use the gallery to keep them happy.
The Flowerista - This isn't any ordinary flower shop. Spacious and bright, plants and customers alike will feel right at home.
Floating Market - Even houseboat owners need to shop from time to time. A floating market provides them with everything they need.
Floating Restaurant - Enjoy the yummy treats that this eatery serves up. Hopefully no one gets seasick from all of the rocking!
Ice Cream Shop - A cool treat any time of the year! There's nothing better than enjoying a cone with a scoop of your favorite flavor!
Bed & Breakfast - Perfect for when you want to get away, but not go far away! Homemade breakfast included, of course!
All Gouda - More cheese please! From Swiss to brie, you'll be saying "Hole-y moly!"
Ski Hut - Get in out of the cold, while sipping a hot mug of cocoa.
Spaetzle Town - Enjoy a steaming plate of traditional Swabian cuisine! All you can eat!
Hydro-Electric Power Plant - Utilizing the current of the nearby river makes this power plant particularly eco-friendly, which in turn makes your residents happy.
Coal-Fired Power Plant - Even when at maximum production, this power plant generates a steady flow of energy.
Small Power Plant - Thanks to its efficient technology, this power plant can reliably supply enough energy for small neighborhoods.
Wind farm - supplies your city with clean energy for a clean city.
Small reactor - you'll be amazed at how much power this little guy can generate.
Nuclear Power Plant - Clean energy with a high energy output for all of your residents' needs. As long as there are no accidents, that is.
Hydropower Dam - This power station uses clean, renewable energy straight from the mountain.
Biomass Powerplant - This electrifying powerplant has a secret. Have you discovered it yet?
Hydropower Dam - This power station uses clean, renewable energy straight from the mountain.

Cypress Tree - This noble tree exudes the charm of a Tuscan landscape.

Park Lamp - Modeled after the street lamps in England, these beacons will even light up a lane cloaked in a thick fog.

Radio Tower - High-speed Internet for residents on the go. They will absolutely love it!

Look-out tower - The perfect place to enjoy a panoramic view of your city.

Globe - A lovely centerpiece for your parks and a reminder of how everyone is connected.
Rust Bucket - Before you toss out an old clunker, why not turn it into a work of art?
Mermaid Fountain - Toss in a coin and make a wish. Maybe it will come true?
Guitar Solo - Rock your city with this decorative statue.
Easter bunny - A memorial to this holiday's hero!
Easter egg tree - Eggs in a tree? What will they think of next?

Antique Gas Pump - Add a classic decorative touch, perfect for gearheads.
Classic telephone booth - This elegant booth was once used to stay in touch on the streets.
Quantum Gazebo - Warm in the winter, cool in the summer. Enjoy a comfortable view of nature without the hassle.
Omni-Lounger - Sit back and relax! This exclusive lounger lets you nap in style.
Exotic Terrarium - Enjoy a miniature landscape of exotic flora in the comfort of your own home.
Topiary Cubes - Who says trees always have to look round? Try a different look to impress your residents.
Conceptual Sculpture - This piece is a real conversation starter. Give your residents something to think and talk about.
Giant Strawberry - Mother Nature can be full of surprises and this one's a real tourist attraction.
Produce Cart - With this convenient cart, your residents will always have fresh veggies on hand.
Rustic Windmill - A breath of fresh air and a taste of the countryside right in the middle of the city.
Triumphal Arch - A beautiful, historical monument add cultural flair and can be quite the tourist attraction.
Niki Sculpture - This blithe and colorful figure will brighten up any corner of the city.
Academia Moderna - This modern sculpture is the perfect reminder that knowledge is power!
Shipwreck - Ahoy, landlubber! Get an authentic pirate shipwreck to decorate your coast.
Yacht - Yachts are a symbol of high-class luxury. How many are anchored in your city?
Small Island - A little piece of paradise right in the middle of your city. How could a mayor say no to that?
Buoy - This wave rider bounces up and down in the water, measuring bits of data about the wind and weather.
Rowboat - Just the right accessory for a sweet romantic gesture or taking a leisurely outing on the water.
Submarine - An old wartime relic with the potential to attract a ton of tourists.
Lighthouse - Let there be light! This lighthouse can guide any ship to the safety of the harbor.
Hammock - The ultimate in relaxation! Kick back and relax with an ice cold drink after a hard day's work.
Mermaid - The fish tail is a big tip off. Who needs legs, when you look that enchanting?!
Flagpole - Look at all the flags flapping in the wind. Can you identify all the different ones?
Mystical Standing Stones - No one is exactly sure who set up this stone arrangement, but residents and tourists alike will love it!
Sand Sculpture - Quite an extraordinary sight and it can even stand up to the strongest surf.
Taikobashi Bridge - This tranquil garden features a vermilion bridge's whose reflection creates a circle resembling a drum, hence the name "Drum Bridge".
Torii - This standalone Japanese-style torii gate is the perfect accessory for your Zen garden.
Sakura Tree - The beautiful blossoms of this Japanese cherry tree create a serene oasis in the middle of your bustling city.
Zeus Statue - The ruler of Mount Olympus in marble form poses with thunder and lightning, a symbol of protection for your city!
Nutcracker - This tough guy can crack the uncrackable!
Reindeer sleigh - Dash throw the snow and zoom high about the city in this sleigh.
Peremett - Watch this beautiful spinning winter decoration powered only by a couple of candles.
Urbyroad – The most famous crosswalk in your city now has it's own memorial. Get a pic before the fans start swarming!
Rock-o-scope - It's like a radio telescope, but even better. Pick up rock signals from every corner of the galaxy!
Heavenly Stairway - It's a long way to the top of this stairway to the heavens. Have you tried floating to the top in a lead zeppelin?
Glam Rock Boot - Glitter, glam, extravagance and a pinch of weirdness are just what your city needs!
Hot Lips - Keep on rockin' til the houses shake! This cheeky statue will roll all the stones.
Hot Rod - These wheels have blues in the trunk and rock under the hood! Just what your city needs!
Eternal Flame - May this fire burn for all of eternity as a reminder of excellence in sportsmanship.
Ice Sports Arena - Watch as the speediest and most graceful skaters smash world records.
Winners' Podium - Only the best of the best are allowed to stand up here.
Rock Monument - Show the world how you rock and roll all night and party everyday with this monument to rock music!
UFO Crash - Is it an alien invasion? All eyes are certain to be on this out-of-this-world decoration!
Climbing Wall - Here's a great place for your residents to just relax and hang out.
Woolly Mammoth - This guy can certainly show your city how to keep it cool.
Space Observatory - Reach for the starts and get the observatory of the future, today!
Weather Hut - Who knows how the wind blows? You will, but you'll need the weather hut first!
City Balloon - Up, up, and away in the beautiful city balloon!
City Canyon - Enjoy the beautiful panoramic view from the observation deck. You might even hear an echo-oo-oo or two!
Moai Statue - On tour from the Easter Island, this statue is the definition of impressive.
Eroded Butte - A natural monument to the beauty of Mother Nature.
Icicle Tree - The icicles on this tree sound as lovely as wind chimes whenever the wind blows.
Totem Spires - Rising into the sky, these natural totem poles are like nature's skyscrapers.
Stone Throne - Gaze down upon your city from the seat of your own stone throne!
Lone Birch - A rare bit of green among the rocky mountain surface.
Nick's Sleigh - Take a ride on this authentically old-fashioned sleigh!
Snow Cannon - Who needs to wait for Jack Frost, when you can take the weather into your own hands?
Snow Plow - Clear a path to fun and mountain adventures in this one-of-a-kind snow plow!
Snowy Firs - The smell of pine needles in the air will make you think it's Christmas all year 'round.
Stone Arch - Move over golden arches, the stone arch is an unforgettable natural monument!
Parisian Tower - Oh la la! You'll feel like you're walking along the banks of the Seine with this beautiful landmark.
Brandenburg Gateway - Don't worry, this monument will not divide your city in two!
Spanish Basilica - Watch as culture and style blend seamlessly into one another.
Castle Carlson - This well-preserved fortress is destined to become a major tourist attraction.
Lady Liberty - This lovely lady welcomes all to your city with open arms and an eternal flame of freedom and peace.
Big Benny - Ding dong! You'll never be late with Big Benny's impeccable sense of timing and chimes that can be heard throughout the city.
Leaning Tower - An unbeatable photo op for residents and tourists alike.
Khafra Sphinx - Mysterious and watchful, this sphinx will keep guard over your city.
Pebble Fountain – The soothing babbling sounds of this natural fountain provide the perfect soundscape for your high-altitude getaway.
Fossil Rock – Peek into the past with this dinoriffic monument. Climb to the top and treat yourself to a couple of brontosaurus burgers!
Mt. Urbmore – A lovely tribute to the founding urbies of Rising Cities.
Ad Column – Spread the word with strategically-placed ad columns all around your city!
Mountain Spring Pump – Get your ice cold, mountain fresh water right here! Operating the pump is a bit of work, but the result is pure refreshment.
Felis Leo – A faithful and mighty lion to stand guard over your city.
Nordic Dolmen – Discover your inner archaeologist by exploring these massive monolithic structures.
Ski Rental – Don’t have your own skis? No problem, just head over to the ski rental before hitting the slopes!
Snowboard Ramp – Indulge the extreme sports athletes among your citizenry with this professional grade snowboard ramp.
Frosty on Wheels – This snowman is a real roadman! Make way for the coolest guy on the mountain.
Snowscape – Transform your playfield into a winter wonderland!
Frosty Fir – The smell of pine needles in the air will make you think it’s Christmas all year ‘round.
Weather Outpost – Who knows how the wind blows? You will, but you’ll need the weather hut first!
Soccer Sandlot – Grab ten friends for some exercise and fresh air on your own, private soccer field.
Golden Shoe – It’s only fitting for the MVM (Most Valuable Mayor) to reward the competition’s MVP (Most Valuable Player).
Pillar of the Community - With supporters like you, the community is surely in good hands.
Soccer Samba Statue - Summer, sun, soccer! Decorate your city with this Soccer Party memento!
Sweetheart Pond - Take a romantic canoe ride for two, while you serenade your sweetie on this pond.
Floral Greenhouse - The roots of love are strong here, allowing you to say it with flowers all year long.
Valentine's Arch - Woo your boo under this delightful arrangement and you could soon be hearing wedding bells.
City Hall Construction Site - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Modest City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Big City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Capital City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Metropolitan City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Cosmopolitan City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Metropolis City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Megopolis City Hall - You can learn more about your City Hall here.
Event Plaza - Here you can throw fantastic parties and events for your residents.
Mystery Building - the suspense is rising! What could it be? Build it and find out.
Mystery Building - the suspense is rising! What could it be? Build it and find out.
Cineplex - Earn MetroMoney by watching films everyday!
Holiday tree - Take a peek under this festive holiday tree throughout the year for terrific prizes like CityCredits, Metro Money and more.
Mystery Building - the suspense is rising! What could it be? Build it and find out.
Winter World Stadium - This magnificent arena will shower you with medals all year long.
Fire Department: Don't play with fire! Your city will stay safe with this modern fire station.
Police Department: Crime doesn't stand a chance against your boys and girls in blue.
Hospital - Modern, clean, and sterile! Colds, coughs, and even killer viruses don't stand a chance in this hospital.
Small Hydrant: Increase your fire department's safety grade.
Large Hydrant: Keep the whole neighborhood safe.
Water Station: Keep your buildings safe, even if there's a large fire.
Water Tank: Heavy duty help for extinguishing big fires, no matter where they are in the city.
Surveillance Camera: Increase your police department's safety grade.
Surveillance System: Keep an eye on crime and protect your citizens.
Surveillance Outpost: Handle police emergencies in a flash with this small outpost.
Surveillance Station: Get the backup you need for crimes big and small.
Emergency Phone - With one of these on every corner, help is only a phone call away!
First Aid Box - With these supplies and a little practice, any citizen can be a first responder.
First Aid Tent - Professional first responders directly on the scene. What more could you ask for?
Emergency Clinic - From knee scrapes to broken arms, this emergency clinic can handle it all.
TODO: LargeEmergencyStation - One of this amazing devices replace hydrants, cams and first aid stations all at once!
Academy: Mold the minds of your city's future heroes.
Asphalt Street - A street with an asphalt surface is a sure winner.
Country Lane - Indispensable in rural areas for an unbeatable price.
Paved Street - Expensive but impressive-looking, these streets will turn your downtown into the bustling nucleus of your city.
Graveled Path - You can learn more about your street here.
Tarred Road - A sturdy surface that will still be doing its job decades from now.
Pier - Keeps your feet dry and looks just amazing.
Gravel path - Nothing more satisfying than the crunch of gravel under your shoes.
Snowy Road - Drivers should exercise caution or they might find themselves face-to-face with a slippery slope.
Graveled Square - A very simple type of square, often used in parks.
Cobblestone Square - Extravagant and smooth cobblestones.
Paved Square - A real treat for anyone out for a lovely stroll.
Turf - Who doesn't love the feel of freshly cut grass between their toes?

category.name: rcl.playfielditems.positdescription
category.item: The Event Plaza hosts a number of various events at regular intervals.
Place your mystery construction site and wait for the big reveal!
